content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Good day, Mr. Li. Thank you for coming to see our apartment in Mannheim. As a landlord, I am always looking to maximize my gains, so I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Could you please provide me with your offer for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to know the monthly rental price. Can you please tell me?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Li. For a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim, we are looking for a monthly rental price of 800 Euros.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate. Can we come to an agreement?

content: Of course, Mr. Li. I am open to negotiating with you. However, as a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would like to hear your offer for the apartment. Based on our initial discussion, I am looking for a monthly rental price of 800 Euros.
name: Heinrich Heine
